scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-scenegraph.js -c -m -o build/vega-scenegraph.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -g d3-path:d3,d3-shape:d3,vega-canvas:vega,vega-loader:vega,vega-util:vega -n vega -o build/vega-scenegraph.js -- index.js && bin/schema > build/vega-scenegraph-schema.json
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-scenegraph.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-scenegraph-schema.json build/vega-scenegraph.js build/vega-scenegraph.min.js
